name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior PHP Engineer with 13+ years of experience in high-performance application development. Highly skilled in **PHP**, with strong knowledge of **HTTP**, **RESTful APIs**, and **Web Infrastructure** principles. Expert in applying **OOP**, **SOLID**, and **Clean Code** principles, alongside proven experience with **Design Patterns** to deliver robust web solutions.
Solid experience in building and securing web applications with a focus on **Web Security** and **Secure Coding** practices. Proficient in using **Docker** for containerization, enhancing deployment processes. A collaborative team player with proven mentorship skills, committed to fostering problem-solving and knowledge-sharing environments.
Additionally, adept in modern technologies such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Demonstrated ability to leverage cloud services including **AWS** and **Azure**, while implementing microservices and CI/CD pipelines in rapid development cycles. Strong background in compliance-driven development for healthcare and financial sectors, with a focus on regulatory standards like HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS.
